#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long

ll mod(ll a)
{
    if(a<0)
        return ((-1)*a);
    else
        return a;
}

int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll ans,n,i,x=1;
        cin>>n;
        if(n%2==0)
            ans=-1;
        else
            ans=1;
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            x=x*(n-i);
            if((n-i-1)%2==0)
                ans=ans-x;
            else
                ans=ans+x;
        }
        ans=x-ans;
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
	return 0;
}
